ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Electron and Proton flux 1 minute rate
ResourceHeader.Description:
* Time stamps mark center of averaging interval (rounded to the second)
                * Energy bins 02 and 03 should not be used for quantitative studies. 
                * Electron intensities are not corrected for ion contamination 
                * Intensities and uncertainties are given in 1/(cm^2 s sr MeV)

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

See the Rules of the road at http://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html. Please acknowledge the Data Providers.
